name: places/ChIJ1_TX5EpZwokRzog3TYLM5Q8
formattedAddress: 303 E 6th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 303 E 6th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Buildings very unsafe and overpriced. No amenities in building and absolutely no safety precautions taken. Had packages stolen constantly from all tenants. Management made aware several times but no changes to safety features. Had an attempted break in to my apartment while I was inside, 3 males with crowbar attempting to get into my door after somehow bypassing the general entry door. VERY UNSAFE. Again - no safety precautions taken to enhance building security even after this was brought to the attention of Matel staff. Building maintenance removed my postings to other tenants attempting to warn them of break-in as management refused to let other occupants be notified. Lastly, I went out of town on the last two weeks of my lease, and when I returned, maintenance had been in my apartment without notifying me - walls had been painted, there was excrements in the bathroom on the toilet and floor, and dirt everywhere. I was told they thought I had moved out because my furniture was gone, but I still had belongings in the closets as my lease was not up… I had emailed Matel prior to my vacation letting them know my official move out date and it was acknowledged via email, yet this date was ignored by staff and entry occurred without my knowledge. Very unprofessional and blame throwing responses given back to me when bringing this to their attention. Would never lease with Matel again.

originalText.text: I’ve waited a year to calm down and write this review and they still receive 1 star.  This management company, specifically Sol is atrocious. They raised my rent by $1,000 without written notice, which is illegal. Sol would not respond to my emails for weeks when i was trying to claim back my deposit and I got so fed up, I went down to the office myself and told him off in front of his coworkers. This company’s business practices are questionable at best and they’ll do everything they can to not return your deposit. Rent from anyone else, really.

originalText.text:
*AVOID THIS PLACE*
*COCKROACH GALORE & THEFT!*
i lived in this horrible building for the past year — my review:
1. packages were STOLEN ALL THE TIME - could not get anything delivered. sol (management) did nothing
2. cockroaches roamed the first floor
3. centipedes crawled everywhere — had them come up my faucet multiple times/in the shower
4. no laundry in building
5. building is not well maintained - dirty floors & stairs — no fire alarms or security
6. moved out & left the place spotless — was given random charges deducted from my security deposit. sol is a greedy greedy man - will make a buck on ANYTHING. will do anything to make money…it’s really saddening

i have never written a review before! please avoid this place at all costs — u will never get any of ur packages, get rats & cockroaches & centipedes crawling all around ur walls — not worth it!

originalText.text: I have lived in Matel building for over 7 years and it has been an awful experience. First I would like to start with management, Sol Eiferman is a revengeful and hateful man. He will go to disgusting lengths to retaliate for something he actually neglected. If I was the owner I would get rid of him in seconds. Furthermore, the building is very poorly maintained, zero renovations for the enormous prices they charge. They unreasonable raise the rent yearly by 20%. There is no laundry in building, zero amenities. Stay away from them.

originalText.text: Best management company in the east village. The staff are extremely responsive, friendly, and empathetic. I recently signed my third lease and it was so easy! The property managers were so patient with all my questions and offered me soup from B&H during the lease signing. They helped me move into my apartment and gave me an antique lamp that compliments my apartments decor. Such thoughtful people. 10/10
